entry.title: Clear Protein Jello
entry.summary:
Ready to get jigg(ly) with it? Dive into our clear protein jello recipe for a delicious, high-protein, low-sugar snack that supports your health and wellness goals. Learn how to make it step-by-step and discover tips for perfecting your jello every time.

More
entry.content:
Clear Protein Jello

Ready to get jigg(ly) with it? Our clear protein jello recipe is here to satisfy your cravings while supporting your health and wellness goals. Whether you're after a guilt-free dessert or a tasty boost to your daily protein intake, this protein-packed jello is low in sugar, full of flavor, and your new go-to snack. With its numerous benefits and easy preparation, it’s a perfect addition to any diet. Try this clear protein jello with any of our SEEQ juicy flavors, and be sure to check out the tips and tricks at the bottom of the page.

 

INGREDIENTS:

  • 1 scoop of SEEQ Watermelon Wave Clear Whey Protein Isolate (or your favorite flavor)
  • 8 oz of cold water
  • 8 oz of boiling water
  • 2 packs of gelatin (1/2 oz) or 1 package of any flavored Jello mix

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Combine cold water and 1 scoop of your favorite SEEQ Clear Whey Protein flavor in a shaker and shake thoroughly.
  2. Pour 8 oz of boiling water into a heat-proof dish or large heat-proof measuring cup (if you're making individual Jello servings).
  3. Add the gelatin to the boiling water and stir until dissolved.
  4. Strain your SEEQ protein into the gelatin mixture and stir gently.
  5. Place the dish into the fridge or, if making individual servings, slowly pour the mixture into glasses.
  6. Refrigerate for 4 hours or until set

TIPS & TRICKS:

  • If you are looking to up this clear protein jello recipe with 39 grams of protein instead of 22 grams — use beef gelatin in place of regular gelatin. Not only are you going to be benefiting from the extra protein but beef gelatin is also packed with collagen!
  • Mix the SEEQ Clear Whey Protein with cold water before adding it to the gelatin mixture to prevent clumps.
  • To get in your daily fruit servings, try adding some cut-up fruit into your jello molds for delightful added flavor and nutrition.
  • To add a bit of fun and creativity, consider using jello molds. You can find a variety of molds on Amazon or at your local store to suit your taste and style!

entry.title: Clear Protein Gummies
entry.content:
Try the tastiest protein snack yet with our SEEQ Protein Gummies. When you're craving something sweet, you want to grab a bag of gummy bears or those sour gummi crawlers, right? Our juicy protein gummies are the chewy, fruity solution to your snacking needs. Perfect for an anytime treat or post-workout recovery, these protein-packed gummies offer a fun and convenient way to boost your protein intake without sacrificing flavor. Try this protein gummy recipe with any of our SEEQ juicy flavors, and be sure to check out the tips and tricks at the bottom of the page.

 

INGREDIENTS:

  • 2 scoops of your favorite SEEQ Clear Whey Protein Isolate
  • 12 oz of water
  • 2 oz of lime or lemon juice
  • 4 tablespoons of gelatin (about 4-5 envelopes of gelatin)

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Combine 12 oz of water and 2 scoops of your favorite SEEQ Clear Whey Protein flavor in a shaker and shake thoroughly (let the foam settle before moving to step 2).
  2. Add your SEEQ Clear Protein mixture and 2 oz of lime or lemon juice to a pot on low heat.
  3. Mix and let it simmer.
  4. Slowly add the gelatin to the pot one tablespoon at a time and whisk the mixture until there are no clumps.
  5. Pour mixtures into molds (we like using the gummy bear molds bought on Amazon!) and refrigerate for an hour or until set.
  6. Carefully pop the gummies out of the molds and store them in an airtight container.

TIPS & TRICKS:

  • Keep the heat on the lowest setting to prevent foam or bubbles after mixing the gelatin. If the mixture doesn’t settle, the gummy bears will retain the foam.
  • For sour gummies, mix 1-3 teaspoons of citric acid with 1-3 teaspoons of sugar and toss the gummies in the mixture until well coated. Adjust the ratio to your taste for super sour gummies.
  • Yield is based on gummy bear mold size. The bigger the mold, the more grams of protein per gummy bear.
  • Add some fun and creativity by using different jello molds. You can find a variety of molds on Amazon or at your local store to suit your taste and style!

entry.title: Clear Protein Slushie
entry.content:
Protein slushies? Yes you heard us right. Protein. Slushies. Need we say more? Grab your favorite flavor of our Clear Whey Isolate Protein and follow the instructions below!

Cook Time: 10 minutes

Servings: 1

INGREDIENTS:

  • 1 scoop of SEEQ Watermelon Wave Clear Protein (or your favorite flavor)
  • 6.5 oz of water
  • Handful of crushed ice
  • Fruit to garnish (optional)

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Start by adding 6.5 oz of water and 1 scoop of your favorite flavor of SEEQ Clear Whey Isolate Protein to a blender bottle.
  2. Shake the blender bottle gently to mix the ingredients together. Do not blend the mixture yet.
  3. Add a handful of ice to a blender and blend it until all the ice is shaved and crushed.
  4. Pour the clear protein mixture from the blender bottle on top of the ice in the blender.
  5. Use a spoon to gently mix the protein mixture with the ice until it's well combined and has a slushie-like consistency.
  6. Pour the Protein Slushie into a glass and garnish with your favorite fruit or other toppings, if desired.
  7. Enjoy your delicious and protein-packed Protein Slushie!

 

TIPS & TRICKS:

  • Like your slushie a little thicker? Easy. Just add extra ice to your blender. We recommend blending a little longer than normal to make sure that all of the larger chunks of ice blend well. 
  • Needing some extra protein to get through the day? This is your permission to add an extra scoop to your protein slush. Not only will you get extra protein but it will also but bursting with flavor. You really can not go wrong in this situation.
